data: Respondents were asked if they had difficulty with self care, such as washing all over or dressing. Respondents who had "some" or "a lot" of difficulty or could not do these tasks at all were classified as having difficulty with self care.

caption: Percentage of difficulty with self care for adults aged 18 and over (95% confidence intervals), United States
